void SONFile::readBlockHeaders ( uint16_t  channel  )  [inline, virtual]

Read block headers for a given channel. This is not done on initialization because it can take a lot of time and we do not want to block the program unless this is absolutely necessary.

References SONBlockHeaders::read().

Referenced by SONEventChannel::read(), SONADCMarkChannel::read(), and SONADCChannels::read().
